name: OINK (Jonasmortensen, jurganson)
description:
Move with WASD and mouse

Press E to pick up, drop or interact

Press P to pause and adjust mouse sensitivity

If you are playing the in-browser version in Firefox you might experience a mouse drift. If so, press the fullscreen button in the lower right corner.

Made as an entry to Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1 by JonasMortensen & jurganson

"lowpoly pig" by fabiotambone is licensed under Creative Commons Attribution.

Stock photos obtained at Pexels.com
